topic.title: Control File Content Before Being Sent to Content Fusion

body.p: A cf-file protocol can be used when a customizer wants to control the file content before it is sent to Content Fusion or control the content that is saved in the original files after the Get Changes action is performed. To use this feature, you must:

ol.li: Set the value of the com.oxygenxml.use.cffile.protocol system property to true. This will result in the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector using the cf-file protocol when requesting the file content or when trying to save the modified content back to the files.
Implement an URLStreamHandlerPluginExtension API to impose the URL stream handlers for the cf-file protocol.
